mail_body:
Hi [Employee Name],

Hope you're having a great week! 

Following up on our initial conversation, I'm thrilled to confirm your upcoming property viewing in London. We've lined up some fantastic furnished apartments that I think you'll really love. 

I've attached a detailed itinerary with addresses and photos. Please take a look and let me know if you have any questions before then.

Looking forward to meeting you there!

Best regards,

Sarah Miller
Relocation Specialist
Global Mobility Solutions
